home.section1.title: What is this site's purpose
home.section1.text: Hello, I'm Roman and I created this website for my own use and as a portfolio piece.
home.section2.title: What does this site contain
home.section2.text: This site contains some of my personal projects, a dev center, and the login allows my family and friends to use some useful tools.

home.sectionWelcome.text: This site is my web development portfolio, a web tools bank, and a cloud for myself and my close ones.

home.sectionActiveDev.text: I improve this project day by day to learn more about building and deploying websites.
